attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government should make Marijuana  legal to people this would help people with pain problems and would save the police millions. Also    Marijuana creates pacifism and is a stress reliever , Will decrease the crime rate if the herb is readily available. It will eliminate the need of an underground subculture and Pot enhances creativity AND no one has ever died of it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
